duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative customer service support, addressing billing questions, policy changes, and customer inquiries about insurance products.
Empower customers with knowledge, deliver efficient problem resolution, and proactively share information to reduce customer effort.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account related questions from internal and external customers.
Maintain expert knowledge of company products, services, and strategies across multiple lines of insurance.
Participate in in-house or outside insurance/industry related courses/seminars as necessary to expand product/system knowledge.
Meet individual performance metrics and goals, identify innovative process changes, and demonstrate above average written and verbal communication skills.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four-year college degree preferred.
